caption: Samuel Palmer (1805–1881; born Newington, England; died Redhill, England), Moeris and Galatea: Illustration for Virgil's Ninth Eclogue, after 1872. Pen and black ink, gray wash, heightened in white, with touches of black chalk; 10.2 x 15.2 cm (image), 13.9 x 19.4 cm (sheet). Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-182)
